description.value:
The art of healing is but one of many avenues for you to elevate yourself; by improving or saving the lives of others, you feel the pull of the divine. If you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{Treat Disease} or perform similar Medicine checks, the first time you roll initiative within the day you gain 1 Zeal at the start of an encounter. In addition, if you use a Medicine check, Cast a Spell or use a recitation to treat or heal others during combat, you also gain Zeal.

Special If you have the Well of Mysticism feat or a similar exploration or downtime feat or spell that heals or treats other creatures, you gain 1 Zeal the next time you roll initiative within that same day.

rules.text: If you Treat Wounds, Administer First Aid, Treat Diseases or perform similar Medicine checks, or if you have the Well of Mysticism feat or a similar exploration or downtime feat or spell that heals or treats other creatures, you @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.macros.Macro.GKvebOKUsIBQZhbN]{Gain Zeal} the next time you roll initiative within that same day.
